mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARS (ID, NAME, PASSENGERS) VALUES(CAR_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{name}, #{passengers})
mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, C.NAME, C.PASSENGERS, D.ID AS D_ID, D.NAME AS D_NAME, CS.ID AS CS_ID, CS.NAME AS CS_NAME FROM CARS C INNER JOIN DRIVERS D ON C.ID = D.CARS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMERS CS ON C.ID = CS.CARS_ID WHERE C.ID = #{ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE CARS SET NAME = #{name}, PASSENGERS = #{passengers} WHERE ID = #{id}
